subject: Basketball
Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
Prudential Center (Newark)
lead_paragraph: The Nets celebrated their anticipated two-year layover at the Prudential Center in Newark, and are scheduled to break ground on the Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Thursday.
snippet: The Nets celebrated their anticipated two-year layover at the Prudential Center in Newark, and are scheduled to break ground on the Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Thursday.
